metadata.synopsis: Two kids are debating sneaking into the circus. This boy is worried about getting caught.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -12; 52; -34- Talk to the tiefling boy near the circus fence.

0.speaker: Mavus
0.text: I want to see Dribbles, but my dad said no...
0.context: NodeContext: really, reallllllly wants to go

1.speaker: Mavus
1.text: You can't get in trouble for trep - for tres - for sneaking into places as a kid, right? Just wondering.
1.context: NodeContext: trying to remember the word 'trespassing'
